Glibc Performance Optimization Candidate Evaluation

Introduction

This site documents the project to optimize Geode LX processor performance by optimziations of individual glibc functions.

README for Glibc optimization project

Current work includes:

  • Memcmp performance test -- improved 1.47x
  • Memcpy performance test -- improved 1.24x
  • Memset performance test -- improved 1.1x
  • Strcmp performance test -- improved 2.32x
  • strcpy performance test -- improved 1.65x
  • Strlen performance test -- improved 1.2x
Each of these is built on a common test framework comprising
  • "test_" Test framework for performance testing
  • "loop_" Standard loops for testing and reporting
  • "stats_" Simple Approximate Statitistics Package
  • "opts_" Callback based command line options handler
  • "deck_" Deck of cards API
  • "fake_" Fake Libc
  • "table_" Simple table utility API
  • "cell_" A smart union datatype
  • "zstring_" Simple string API
For memcpy, permutation was used to determine the optimal ordering of the preamble see: Permuted preamble memcpy performance test.
